pullrequest.title: Support more joint types in model editor

content.raw: I think it's going to be difficult to give default values with our current gearbox joint implementation. I managed to use the editor to create something like the [gearbox.world](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/default/test/worlds/gearbox.world). I used a third link as the reference body, and gearbox joint has two unit z axes
content.html: I think it's going to be difficult to give default values with our current gearbox joint implementation. I managed to use the editor to create something like the gearbox.world. I used a third link as the reference body, and gearbox joint has two unit z axes
